content:
Hi, sorry if this is off-topic.

Will the ByteCode Alliance be taking part in Google Summer of Code 2024? I would love to get involved in the WebAssembly community and start contributing. I also like the idea of a committed mentee-mentorship partnership aiming to complete a project, which is provided by the GSoC framework.

Kind Regards, Max :)
@Bailey Hayes this sounds like a great place to appear
That would be really wonderful. We'd need a volunteer to head this up. I believe it involves applying as an org first and then we would also need a group willing to mentor and sponsor a project.

FWIW, in spring 2021 I put together an application for GSoC on behalf of BA; unfortunately we were not selected, but I can say at least that the effort on our end was ~1 working day to collect ideas and write up the application.

There's still an old issue with a few project ideas for Wasmtime, some of which may still be relevant (and I'd have to imagine a bunch of project ideas now exist with the component-model work): https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/2667

I'm on parental leave now so I can't lead any 2024 application but personally I think it could be worthwhile re-applying, perhaps taking a bit more time to understand what they're looking for; unfortunately there was no feedback on the rejection before

Meta-issue: GSoC project ideas 路 Issue #2667 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
We are planning to apply to Google Summer of Code; let's brainstorm projects that might be interesting! I'll start with a few and can update as ideas come in: Language bindings for Wasmtime engine:...

Hello,

This is follow up question based on above discussion. I am trying to build a project that aims to use Wasmtime and Cranelift as dependencies. I would like to contribute more to these projects in order to understand things in deeper levels. If Bytecode Alliance is participating in GSoC 2024 then I would love to contribute and develop a healthy mentee-mentorship partnership. Is there any update regarding this?

Thank you,
Riya
